Uses of Class
org.cougaar.bootstrap.XURLClassLoader

Packages that use XURLClassLoader
org.cougaar.bootstrap Provides an extensible utility for starting an application composed from a complex set of jars. 
 

Uses of XURLClassLoader in org.cougaar.bootstrap
 

Subclasses of XURLClassLoader in org.cougaar.bootstrap
 class BootstrapClassLoader
          A Classloader which uses slightly different rules for class loading: Prefer classes loaded via this loader rather than the parent.
 class LoggingClassLoader
          Classloader that logs accessed classes, similar to "java -verbose:class", but also notes XURLClassLoader details such as jar paths.
 

Methods in org.cougaar.bootstrap that return XURLClassLoader
static XURLClassLoader XURLClassLoader.newInstance(java.net.URL[] urls)
          Creates a new instance of XURLClassLoader for the specified URLs and default parent class loader.
static XURLClassLoader XURLClassLoader.newInstance(java.net.URL[] urls, java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
          Creates a new instance of XURLClassLoader for the specified URLs and parent class loader.
